'''''thaur''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning ''abhorrent, abominable''.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''thaur''</ref>  Its [[Old Sindarin]] form would be ''t<sup>h</sup>aura''.

==Examples==
* ''[[Sauron]]'' (from ''Thauron'')
* ''[[Gorthaur]]''

==See also==
* ''[[delos]]''
* ''[[fuia-]]''.
